Streamline Campus Maintenance with FixIT

FixIT revolutionizes how maintenance issues are reported and resolved at Politeknik Negeri Malang, ensuring a safer and more efficient campus environment. Say goodbye to delays and hello to proactive solutions.

About

Who We Are

FixIT was developed to address the challenges of maintaining campus facilities at Politeknik Negeri Malang. Our goal is to create a collaborative environment where students, staff, and faculty can report issues and track resolutions effortlessly.

Efficient Repairs

Streamline the repair process with quick response times and skilled technicians.

Timely Updates

Receive regular updates on the status of your maintenance requests.

Community Support

Engage with a community dedicated to improving campus facilities.

Get Assistance

Our team is here to help you with any issues or questions about FixIT.
